decisions.name: Delete_Fields_when_no_Billing_Address
decisions.label: Delete Fields when no Billing Address

rules.name: Delete_Fields_when_no_Billing
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 5 AND 4)
rules.label: Delete Fields when no Billing Address

decisions.name: Delete_Fields_when_no_Mailing_Address
decisions.label: Delete Fields when no Mailing Address

rules.name: Delete_Fields_when_no_Mailing
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 5 AND 4)
rules.label: Delete Fields when no Mailing Address

decisions.name: Inherit_changed_to_yes_with_AM_Billing_Address
decisions.label: Inherit changed to yes with AM - Billing Address

rules.name: Inherit_changed_to_yes_w_AM_Billing
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)
rules.label: Inherit changed to yes w/ AM - Billing

decisions.name: Inherit_changed_to_yes_with_AM_Mailing_Address
decisions.label: Inherit changed to yes with AM - Mailing Address

rules.name: Inherit_changed_to_yes_with_AM_Mailing
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (3 AND 2 AND 4 AND 5)
rules.label: Inherit changed to yes with AM - Mailing

rules.name: Inherit_w_o_AM_Billing
rules.conditionLogic: (5 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)
rules.label: Inherit w/o AM - Billing

rules.name: Inherit_w_o_AM_Mailing
rules.conditionLogic: (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)
rules.label: Inherit w/o AM - Mailing

rules.name: New_Changed_Address_Lookup_Billing
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 4 AND 3)
rules.label: New/Changed Address Lookup - Billing

rules.name: New_Changed_Address_Lookup_Mailing
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 4 AND 3)
rules.label: New/Changed Address Lookup-Mailing

decisions.name: Update_Inherited_Subscribers_AM_Billing_Address
decisions.label: Update Inherited Subscribers AM - Billing Address

rules.name: Update_Inherited_Subscribers_AM
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 3) AND 2) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Update Inherited Subscribers AM

rules.name: Update_Inherited_Subscribers_AM_Mailing
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 3) AND 2) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Update Inherited Subscribers AM- Mailing Address

rules.name: Billing_Update_Inherited_Subscribers_w_o_AM
rules.label: Billing - Update Inherited Subscribers w/o AM

rules.name: Mailing_Update_Inherited_Subscribers_w_o_AM
rules.label: Mailing - Update Inherited Subscribers w/o AM

Flow.description: When Mailing/Billing addresses changes on Primary Contact, update addresses to subscribing Relationship.
Flow.interviewLabel: Address Manager - Contact Billing & Mailing Address {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Address Manager - Contact Billing & Mailing Address
